page.title: 10Uyeasound Standing Stones.
page.content: There are 2 standing stones near Clivocast,one 8 feet high,the other 2 feet high.Myth says that trolls are related to stone and earth.Trolls only come out at night and if they are still out at sunrise they turn to stone. There was once a troll called Spike who liked to play tricks on people.He went into a house just before sunrise where a man was watching T.V.Grown-ups can't see trolls but children can. Spike switched off the T.V. and the man switched it on again.The son came in and said,"there's a troll over there,"to which his Dad replied,"you must be seeing things." So Spike took the boy and they ran past Clivocast just as the sun rose but both were turned to stone and the standing stones remain to this day.
